name: Hyperion (Koroberus, Shad)
description:
A portal, separating two entities that long to meet each other.
Why are they fighting together and separately in these endless chambers?
Discover together with them from your own side of the portal.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam.

Contributors:
- Samm (Koroberus);
- Shad (ShadowScrew).

Controls:
- WASD and Arrow Keys to move each character;
- Shift keys to interact with objects;
- Space-bar to pass the lantern.
